name: GA Code Visibility
author: Off-Site Services, Inc.

sections.description:
Allows admins to add Google Analytics code to <head> and use it only when site is switched to “Search Engine Visibility”.

Use Settings->Reading: check/uncheck “Search Engine Visibility” and add code to “GA code fields”.
sections.installation:
1. Upload entire /ga-add folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate plugin through Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Add code Google Analytics in Settings>Reading “GA code fields”
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Tested with WP 5.7

0.3

  • Tested with WP 5.0.3

0.2

  • Tested with WP 4.9.4

short_description: Easily add Google Analytics code to your head and use it only when site is switched to "Search Engine Visibility".
description:
Allows admins to add Google Analytics code to <head> and use it only when site is switched to “Search Engine Visibility”.

Use Settings->Reading: check/uncheck “Search Engine Visibility” and add code to “GA code fields”.

screenshots.caption: Simply paste Google Analytics code into GA code fields
